Desc.entry: A voluntary group that works to raise awarness of the park and encourages its good use by the community. The group helps to raise funds to improve park facilities and works with the Park Ranger Service and local councillors to help implement Sheffield City Council's regeneration plan for the park. Organises an annual festival in July. Welcomes new members of all ages.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Every 2 months (full general meetings), please contact for details
